text: Latest @BerkeleyIGS poll: “The tide has turned” in the #CARecall: @GavinNewsom could be headed for a landslide, mandate-level win on Tuesday. Likely voters oppose the recall 60-38.5%, and 39% of them have already voted. @larryelder leads replacement field with 38%, Paffrath 10%. https://t.co/xvkugVn0be
